description:
A flashback reveals Robin`s motives for cooperating with CP9, Nami`s shocking discovery about the archaeologist`s past, and Luffy`s determination to save his friend!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everything Is for Her Friends! Robin in the Darkness!
Par amitié avant tout ! Robin dans les ténèbres
Subete wa Nakama no Tame ni! Yami no Naka no Robin!
Всё ради накама! Робин во тьме!
كلّ شيء من أجل أصدقائها! الظّلمة بداخل روبين!
すべては仲間の為に! 闇の中のロビン!
